name: Böbl (NES)
description:
Includes:
- NES ROM, playable on a variety of platforms via emulation
Böbl is a short game for the NES. Now available as a ROM file.
It was made in 1 month for NESdev compo 2019.  We invite you to check all the other games from NESdevcompo 2019.
An OST release will follow very soon... Stay tuned!
Controls
You're a bubble, water is your friend and solid blocks kill you. Hold A to dive, then release and let buoyancy handle the rest. Let's find all the lost duckies!
Download & install instructions
Download the ROM and run it in an NES emulator such as Nestopia or Mesen.
For support, consider joining our Discord Server, the community may be able to help you more quickly than we can.
Morphcat Games
Code and audio: @miau6502
Graphics and level design: @NicolasBetoux
